title: Home Health Care Services app for Chennai (service discovery + booking)

requirements.text: Create the core user flows for a Home Health Care Services app focused on Chennai: browse services, view service details, and submit a booking request.

quotes: Home Health Care Services app for chennai

acceptanceCriteria: Users can see a list of available home health care services for Chennai.
Users can open a service details view with clear information (service name, description, pricing, duration, coverage areas in Chennai, and what is included).
Users can submit a booking request with: selected service, patient name, phone, Chennai area/locality, preferred date/time, and notes.
After booking submission, the user sees a confirmation state and can view their submitted booking(s).

requirements.text: Implement backend data models and APIs to support service discovery and booking requests, with persistent storage in the single Motoko actor.

quotes: Home Health Care Services app for chennai

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes query methods to list services and fetch a service by id.
Backend exposes update method(s) to create a booking request.
Bookings are stored persistently and can be listed for the currently authenticated user (or by a stable anonymous identifier if the user is not signed in).
All APIs return typed results with clear success/error cases (e.g., not found, validation errors).

requirements.text: Add frontend pages/components for: Home (Chennai-focused landing), Services (search/filter), Service Details, and Booking form; wire them to the backend using React Query.

quotes: Home Health Care Services app for chennai

acceptanceCriteria: Services list supports searching by keyword and filtering by Chennai area/locality (e.g., Adyar, T. Nagar, Velachery, Anna Nagar) and/or category.
Service Details page is reachable from the list and displays all key service info.
Booking form validates required fields and prevents submission until valid.
React Query handles loading, success, and error states for all reads/writes.

requirements.text: Add a coherent visual theme appropriate for a healthcare services marketplace (English UI text), and apply it consistently across layout, typography, and components without using a blue/purple-dominant palette.

quotes: Home Health Care Services app for chennai

acceptanceCriteria: The app has a consistent, polished theme (colors, typography, spacing) suitable for healthcare.
All user-facing text is in English.
Primary/secondary actions and form inputs have clear visual hierarchy and accessibility-friendly contrast.
Theme is applied consistently across all pages created in this build.

requirements.text: Add static generated image assets (logo and hero illustration) and display them in the UI (no backend image routing).

quotes: Home Health Care Services app for chennai

acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are placed under frontend/public/assets/generated.
Home page displays the hero image and the app logo in the header/brand area.
Images are referenced via static paths and load correctly in production build.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (no additional backend services).
Do not modify frontend paths designated as immutable by the platform; compose existing UI components instead of editing them directly.
Use English for all user-facing UI text.
nonGoals: Real-time chat, WebSockets, or live location/maps integration.
Third-party authentication providers (only Internet Identity if authentication is used).
Advanced dispatching/agent assignment, staff scheduling, or ambulance/emergency workflows.

required: Warm, human-centered home healthcare hero illustration (hhc-chennai-hero.dim_1600x900.png)

goalsToAdd: Build a Home Health Care Services app tailored for users in Chennai with service discovery and booking.
preferencesToAdd: Use English for all user-facing text.
